Uses of Interface
org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels.PaymentChannelServerListener.HandlerFactory

  • Packages that use PaymentChannelServerListener.HandlerFactory 
    Package Description
    org.bitcoinj.jni  
    org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels
    Micropayment channels allow for rapid tiny payments to be made to a third party once a channel has been set up, using some of the advanced features of the Bitcoin protocol.

    • Uses of PaymentChannelServerListener.HandlerFactory in org.bitcoinj.jni

      Classes in org.bitcoinj.jni that implement PaymentChannelServerListener.HandlerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NativePaymentChannelHandlerFactory
      An event listener that relays events to a native C++ object.

    • Uses of PaymentChannelServerListener.HandlerFactory in org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels

      Constructors in org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels with parameters of type PaymentChannelServerListener.HandlerFactory 
      Constructor and Description
      PaymentChannelServerListener(TransactionBroadcaster broadcaster, Wallet wallet, int timeoutSeconds, Coin minAcceptedChannelSize, PaymentChannelServerListener.HandlerFactory eventHandlerFactory)
      Sets up a new payment channel server which listens on the given port.
